website_summaries.verdict: The new Moto 360 is much faster and generally better-looking than its predecessor, but the introduction of a chunky bezel around the 1.2in display means it's not a cut-and-dry upgrade, especially at £299/$299.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but....xx
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong it's amazing but there are alot of cons though which the battery only lasts until 10hours and even lower on more usage you use and the price is not too bad but I could got Samsung active watch instead for kinda of the same or lower price and does mostly the or even more than this watch I got but all that it's still amazing though so thank you xx
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressive 3rd generation smart watch with all the latest gadgets
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I opened the box this watch revolutionised how I feel about wearable tech. It's sleek, stylish and looks very expensive. Setting it up has been extremely easy and it has an app for everything. I'm most impressed that it makes sure I don't forget important events and meetings as it syncs brilliantly with my schedule providing essential notifications for every appointment without being intrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting great things from this watch however a faulty heart rate monitor was of no real value to what is essentially a fitness device so the watch was returned to Amazon. I did not request a replacement as to be honest I was quite underwhelmed by this product so requested a refund instead.
customer_reviews.author: Glazzy

customer_reviews.title: Love this smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: The presentation of the smartwatch in the casing is just incredible, make the unboxing experience a real pleasure! In terms of the watch itself, I have been waiting for ages to find an elegant (not squared or too sporty) and functional watch that I can use while runing and in the office. The interface works perfectly and is capable of using all the applications that I use like Spotify, Whatsapp and adding my personal music (8GB of memory) in case of not having internet. This is a really good option for those thinking in buying a new smartwatch!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: In addition to having computer functions, its appearance is elegant without leaving the youthful. Meets all the expectations it had. Perfect for the size of your wrist. Calculates pulsations very exactly. The connection with the mobile is very fluid, which is noteworthy since other models have worse quality in that regard. It is a good gift if you are looking for a smartwatch with quality and aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: mariaserratii

customer_reviews.title: Big, light and resistant.
customer_reviews.text: The smartwatch is great. It has a very nice leather strap and it is very light watch. That it is waterproof I also liked a lot because it allows me to take a shower with it calmly. The screen size is adequate too and price seems to me to be very good. If you want something good, you have to pay for it. I fully recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch that lacks the endurance.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking watch but the battery life sucks. A bit below wear os standards. I have two wear os watches by the way so I know. It's alright that it doesn't have a speaker, I don't use it anyway. Bezels are huge. It's okay if it has any purpose like a capacitive scroll wheel bit it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: JT Manuel

customer_reviews.title: That's great.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the watch. It comes in a super small, very nice box. It comes very well sealed and speaking of it, I really liked the texture of the strap. It's matte black, with lots of features and good battery life. At this price you can't think about it. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Klausen

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch I love but two issues only with battery life & no ECG
customer_reviews.text: Brightness high is good but love brightness to save battery life more could b tab better battery life can last 3days max but 3 extra days on battery saver too but only get the time only on battery saver....but one great watch three stars for quality of the watch amazing ...only issues are battery life three days and no ECG on the watch yet either .....
customer_reviews.author: Skye hayes

customer_reviews.title: Felt conned
customer_reviews.text: The watch I have no gripes with at all, but no sooner I bought it for £299 and suddenly Amazon are selling it for £199, which really ticks me off.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Hating the ways
customer_reviews.text: I feel truly unhappy so far. The watch keeps disconnecting all the time
customer_reviews.author: Gavin S.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like an upgrade from the Gen2 watch
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than 2nd gen, but much more responsive. Like Google pay. Works with all my old android apps. Lasts more than a day. Don't like the charger (and can't buy a second one yet). Unfortunately needs 20mm straps, so all my gen 2 straps don't fit...
customer_reviews.author: I. Lennon

customer_reviews.title: Great return of an old friend.
customer_reviews.text: It was great to see the Moto 360 return and immediate thought was that the changes looked great and the description suggested good changes. It is as good as expected with a few thoughts, it support battery and power handling very well and reports are useful but it needs a bigger battery. I'm not over pleased or concerned about the reduced screen size but miss the flat tire that used space a lot better. Overall, I love the changes and watch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Software is bad
customer_reviews.text: The silver with brown leather strap looked very nice. However, the software is enough to drive you up the wall, crap. Battery life is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: happysnapper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it's easy to use and setup, it looks sleek and does everything I need to the downside is the battery isn't the longest but for £200 it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elder-Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best smart watch.
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch it looks cool it does everything a smart watch should do.
customer_reviews.author: miss M Brett

customer_reviews.title: Not much use on a treadmill.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch to monitor my exercise mainly, most of which is done on a treadmill. Unfortunately the recorded results are hopeless.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Gerbage
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a software issue that was unable to be fixed remotely. Refund was forthcoming.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Liddle

product_meta.title: Motorola Moto 360 3rd Gen Smartwatch - Stainless Steel Case With 20mm Bands, All-day Battery, & WearOs Rose gold

Exceptional design and durability - Crafted from premium materials: industry leading scratch resistant glass, latest heart rate monitor with a 3ATM rating presented in a SUS316 stainless steel body sealed with titanium screws and coated in an ultra hard scratch resistant PVD coating “what makes it different is the materials and build quality” - Digital Trends
Extended Battery Life - Industry Leading Battery with lightening fast charging in under 60 minutes, sustain up to two days of full usage: always on screen, apps, GPS tracking, notifications or music

All your favorite apps on WearOS - Spotify, Google Music, Google Pay, Shazzam, Viber and many more. The latest GPS, heart rate and step counting technology, with seamless compatibility whether your are an iPhone or Android user.

Track your workouts - Built in with the latest GPS, heart rate and step count technology means seamless compatibility with Google Fit, Strava, Adidas Running, Nike Run Club and many more of your favourite health monitoring apps
